languages.text: "В законе — сила его, в законе — правда его, в смирении — щедрость его. И да пребудет мудрость его с теми, кто истинно верует".

traits.locale_text: "В законе — сила его, в законе — правда его, в смирении — щедрость его. И да пребудет мудрость его с теми, кто истинно верует".
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."
languages.original_text: "В законе — сила его, в законе — правда его, в смирении — щедрость его. И да пребудет мудрость его с теми, кто истинно верует".

traits.locale_text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

traits.locale_text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."

traits.locale_text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."

traits.locale_text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."

languages.text: “在律法中，我们寻得了祂的力量。在教条中，我们寻得了祂的真理。在谦卑中，我们寻得了祂的慷慨。愿祂的智慧指引那些真正心怀信仰之人。”
languages.original_text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."

traits.locale_text: “在律法中，我们寻得了祂的力量。在教条中，我们寻得了祂的真理。在谦卑中，我们寻得了祂的慷慨。愿祂的智慧指引那些真正心怀信仰之人。”
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: «En la ley encontramos Su poder. En la ley encontramos Su verdad. En la humildad encontramos Su generosidad. Que Su sabiduría acuda a Sus auténticos creyentes».
languages.original_text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."

traits.locale_text: «En la ley encontramos Su poder. En la ley encontramos Su verdad. En la humildad encontramos Su generosidad. Que Su sabiduría acuda a Sus auténticos creyentes».
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: 「法の中に主の力はあります。法の中に主の真実があります。謙虚さの中に主の寛大さがあります。主の知性が、心から信じる人々へ届きますように」
languages.original_text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."

traits.locale_text: 「法の中に主の力はあります。法の中に主の真実があります。謙虚さの中に主の寛大さがあります。主の知性が、心から信じる人々へ届きますように」
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: « Dans la loi, nous trouvons Son pouvoir. Dans la loi, nous trouvons Sa vérité. Dans l'humilité, nous trouvons Sa générosité. Puisse Sa sagesse éclairer les véritables croyants. »
languages.original_text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."

traits.locale_text: « Dans la loi, nous trouvons Son pouvoir. Dans la loi, nous trouvons Sa vérité. Dans l'humilité, nous trouvons Sa générosité. Puisse Sa sagesse éclairer les véritables croyants. »
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: "Im Gesetz finden wir Seine Macht. Im Gesetz finden wir Seine Wahrheit. In der Demut finden wir Seine Großzügigkeit. Und möge Seine Weisheit zu allen wahrhaft Gläubigen kommen."
languages.original_text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."

traits.locale_text: "Im Gesetz finden wir Seine Macht. Im Gesetz finden wir Seine Wahrheit. In der Demut finden wir Seine Großzügigkeit. Und möge Seine Weisheit zu allen wahrhaft Gläubigen kommen."
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF

languages.text: "Kanunda O'nun gücünü buluruz. Kanunda O'nun hakikatini buluruz. Tevazuda O'nun cömertliğini buluruz. Gerçekten inananlar, O'nun bilgeliğine kavuşsun."
languages.original_text: "In the law, we find His power. In the law, we find His truth. In humility, we find His generosity. And may His wisdom come to those who truly believe."

traits.locale_text: "Kanunda O'nun gücünü buluruz. Kanunda O'nun hakikatini buluruz. Tevazuda O'nun cömertliğini buluruz. Gerçekten inananlar, O'nun bilgeliğine kavuşsun."
traits.speaker: AdministratumWorkerF
